Package game.weapon

Class GetAllowableActions

java.lang.Object
game.weapon.GetAllowableActions
public class GetAllowableActions
extends java.lang.Object
A utils class for all the weapons that can do Attack Surrounding Action

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GetAllowableActions()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static boolean canSkill​(Actor whoHasThis, Location currentLocation)
    Checks if there is an actor of different type so that the attacker can use the skill Apporach description: 1) get surrounding 2) check if there is an actor 2.1) if there is an actor 2.1.1) check if the actor and the attacker can attack each other 2.1.1.1) if can, return true
    static java.util.List<Action> getSurroundingAttackAllowableActions​(Location currentLocation, WeaponItem w)
    To make the weapons return all the possible actions that can be done applies open close principle Approach decription: 1) use currentLocation which is updated by tick 2) check if there is someone at the same location as the weapon 3) if there is someone, proceed else, return nothing 4) checks surrounding 5) if it has an actor check if there is a target that the attacker can use the skill on if can, get the list of targets around this attacker Assumption: needs tick to be executed at least once in order to have the available actions
    static java.util.List<Actor> getTargets​(boolean isSkill, Location currentLocation)
    If can use the skill, get all the actors around this position Apporach description: 1) check if the skill can be activated 2) get the surrounding 3) check if it contains an actor 3.1) if contains an actor, add to resulting list

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • GetAllowableActions

      public GetAllowableActions()

  • Method Details

    • getSurroundingAttackAllowableActions

      public static java.util.List<Action> getSurroundingAttackAllowableActions​(Location currentLocation, WeaponItem w)
      To make the weapons return all the possible actions that can be done applies open close principle Approach decription: 1) use currentLocation which is updated by tick 2) check if there is someone at the same location as the weapon 3) if there is someone, proceed else, return nothing 4) checks surrounding 5) if it has an actor check if there is a target that the attacker can use the skill on if can, get the list of targets around this attacker Assumption: needs tick to be executed at least once in order to have the available actions
      Parameters:
      currentLocation - the current location of the weapon which is also the wielder
      w - the weapon used
      Returns:
      a list of actions that the wielder can do with this weapon list is empty if this weapon is on ground and not held by anyone there is no one around

    • canSkill

      public static boolean canSkill​(Actor whoHasThis, Location currentLocation)
      Checks if there is an actor of different type so that the attacker can use the skill Apporach description: 1) get surrounding 2) check if there is an actor 2.1) if there is an actor 2.1.1) check if the actor and the attacker can attack each other 2.1.1.1) if can, return true
      Parameters:
      whoHasThis - the attacker
      currentLocation - the location of the attacker
      Returns:
      true, if there is an actor of different type in the attacker's surrounding false, if there is no actor of different type in the attacker's surrounding

    • getTargets

      public static java.util.List<Actor> getTargets​(boolean isSkill, Location currentLocation)
      If can use the skill, get all the actors around this position Apporach description: 1) check if the skill can be activated 2) get the surrounding 3) check if it contains an actor 3.1) if contains an actor, add to resulting list
      Parameters:
      isSkill - whether can skill or not
      currentLocation - the current position of the attacker
      Returns:
      list of actors around the attacker list is empty if skill cannot be done no actor around
